meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive MaryAnn Toner Andy McKay Charles Miller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2791.

td.p: MaryAnn Toner, a data entry operator from Westmont, Illinois
Andy McKay, a technical editor from Brielle, New Jersey
Charles Miller, from Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,001)

tr.td: BRAZIL
PROVERBS
TV COPS
COOKING
THE SUPREME COURT
GREETINGS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Francisco de Orellana said he ran into this race of warrior women while looking for El Dorado\'s gold')
